snippet: Congressional incumbents in both parties are dealing with unexpected electoral challenges because of redistricting, with Democrats particularly vulnerable in what was once friendly territory.
abstract: Congressional incumbents in both parties in New York State are dealing with unexpected electoral challenges because of redistricting, with Democrats particularly vulnerable in what was once friendly territory.
lead_paragraph: Congressional incumbents in both parties are dealing with unexpected electoral challenges because of redistricting, with Democrats particularly vulnerable in what was once friendly territory.

headline.seo: In House Races, Redistricting a Hurdle for New York Democrats
headline.main: Redrawn Districts Present a Hurdle for Democrats
headline.print_headline: Redrawn Districts Present A Hurdle for Democrats
